# 𒌗 𒌚 ≈ 𒀸⋅𒐁𒑖 ≈ 𒀴

𒌗 ʸaraḥ year month 𒌓𒎌 jourmer immi(mes) "days"

𒌗 = 𒌓 𒌍 ⋍ 𒌚 ITI, ITU, TI₁₀ time itud, itid Zeit 𒌓𒌍 moon / month => 𒌘

𒌗 «Sin» "Iti" Moon
𒌓 Sun "Uta"

𒌓 सूर sū́ra સૂર્ય sū́rya 𑀲𑀽𑀭𑁆𑀬 (Brahmi script)
𒌗 סהרא sahrā ⲟⲟϩ ( ⲟ ⲟ=𐤏=ס=σ s! ϩ HR ) <
☽ տարի tari 𐌕𐌉𐌖𐌓 tiur 𒋫 taurᵒⁿ 𓄋 ⲧⲁⲡ > corn > horn 𓎛𓆰𓈖𓄏𓏤 horn ቀርን qarn ≠ 𓄋 ⲧⲁⲡ

𒊺 ⇔ 𒌍 ŠE EŠ

𒌓 UT iteration 𓇋 𓏏 𓂋 𓇳 | time, season

𒌍 ušu₃ thirty, 30 •eš₅u 𒐈×𒌋 3×10 (eš₅ “three” * 𒌋 u “ten”

𒌋 MAN mono moon ☽ in Elamite script =>
𒌋𒌋 MAN men/Min/Menes/Amun/Admin 𒌋=& King 𒈗 𒈫 min = 2
𒌋𒌋𒌋 many moons 𒌗 month 𒍨 𒌍 ☾☾☾ 𒈨𒌍 mes Mehrzahl menge men 𓏠 𓈖

𒌚 = 𒌓 + 4 * 𒌋 4 weeks
𒌗 = 𒌓 + 3 weeks 𒌋𒌋𒌋 𓅡 𓎡 𓏏 𓏲 𓏥 | decans | #bꜣktw > weeks à 10 days 𓁶 𓏤 𓇳 𓎆 | ten-day 'week'

3 seasons

Reš Šatti 𒊕𒈬 𓉐 𓂋 𓏏 𓇳 proto > πreshid בראשית Reš 𒊕
Mišil Šatti 𒁇𒈬 𓈙 𓈗 𓇳 š.mꜣ.r ⋍ 𓈗 𓈙 𓇳 mišil
Qīt Šatti 𒌀 𒈬 𓄿 𓆷 𓐍 𓏏 𓇳 ⋍ 𓐍 𓏏 𓇳 Qīt

Mišil Šatti 𒁇𒈬 𒁇 bar ⋍ part 𓉐 𓂋 𓏏 𓇳 𒊕 proto
Reš Šatti 𒊕𒈬 𓇳 𓈙 ⋍ 𓈙 𓈗 𓇳
Qīt Šatti 𒌀 𒈬 𓐍 𓏏 𓇳 ⋍ 𓄿 𓆷 𓐍 𓏏 𓇳

Months:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Babylonian_calendar

1 Araḫ Nisānu - 𒌚𒁈 “beginning” Nisan נִיסָן
2 Araḫ Āru - 𒌚 𒄞 “Blossoming” Ayyār أَيَّار Iyar אִיָּיר
3 Araḫ Simanu - 𒌚𒋞 Sīn - 𒂗𒍪 Maštaba (Gemini) - 𒀯𒈦𒋰𒁀 Sivan סִיוָן Ḥazīrān حَزِيرَان May/Jun
4 Araḫ Dumuzu - 𒌚𒋗 'Month of Tammuz'Tammuz - 𒀭𒌉𒍣 Alluttu (Cancer) - 𒀯𒀠𒇻 Tammuz תַּמּוּז Tammūz تَمُّوز Jun/Jul
5 Araḫ Abu - 𒌚𒉈 Gilgamesh - 𒄑𒂅𒈦[3] Nēšu (Leo) - 𒀯𒌨 Ab אָב Āb آب Jul/Aug
6 Araḫ Ulūlu - 𒌚𒆥 Ishtar - 𒀭𒈹 Sisinnu (Virgo) - 𒀯𒀳 Elul אֱלוּל Aylūl أَيْلُول Aug/Sep
7 Araḫ Tišritum - 𒌚𒇯 'Month of Beginning'(i.e. the start of the second half-year) Shamash - 𒀭𒌓 Zibānītu (Libra) - 𒀯𒄑𒂟 Tishrei תִּשְׁרֵי Tishrīn al-Awwal تِشْرِين الْأَوَّل Sep/Oct
8 Araḫ Samnu - 𒌚𒀳 'month, the eighth'[4] Marduk - 𒀭𒀫𒌓 Zuqaqīpu (Scorpio) - 𒀯𒄈𒋰 Cheshvan מַרְחֶשְׁוָן/חֶשְׁוָן Tishrīn ath-Thānī تِشْرِين الثَّانِي Oct/Nov
9 Araḫ Kislimu - 𒌚𒃶 Nergal - 𒀭𒄊𒀕𒃲 Pabilsag (Sagittarius) - 𒀯𒉺𒉋𒊕 Kislev כִּסְלֵו Kānūn al-Awwal كَانُون الْأَوَّل Nov/Dec
10 Araḫ Ṭebētum - 𒌚𒀊 'Muddy Month'[5] Papsukkal - 𒀭𒊩𒆠𒋚 Suḫurmāšu (Capricorn) - 𒀯𒋦𒈧𒄩 Tebeth טֵבֵת Kānūn ath-Thānī كَانُون الثَّانِي Dec/Jan
11 Araḫ Šabaṭu - 𒌚𒊭𒉺𒌅 Adad - 𒀭𒅎 Gula (Aquarius) - 𒀯𒄖𒆷 Shebat שְׁבָט Shubāṭ شُبَاط Jan/Feb
12 Araḫ Addaru / Adār - 𒌚𒊺 'Month of Adar'Erra - 𒀭𒅕𒊏 Zibbātu (Pisces) - 𒀯𒆲𒎌 Adar אֲדָר (אֲדָר א׳/אֲדָר רִאשׁון if there is an intercalary month that year) Ādhār آذَار Feb/Mar
Intercalary 13 Araḫ Makaruša Addari[citation needed]

Araḫ Addaru Arku - 𒌚𒊺𒂕
Assur - 𒀭𒀸𒋩 In year 17 of the 19-year cycle, the intercalary month was named Araḫ Ulūlu - 𒌚𒆥 Adar II

אֲדָר ב׳/אֲדָר שֵׁנִי
Mart (Âzâr)

𒌗 𒌚 itu
𒌗 𒊺 𒁶 itu še kin kud
𒌗 𒋞 𒄑𒉌𒊒 𒁀𒃻 itu síg giš-ì-šub ba-gar 𒄑⋍𒆸 giš gish (old grapheme?) 𒄑𒉌𒊒 ušub "brick-mold; a geometric figure"
𒌗 𒊺𒋼𒀀𒊏𒅅 itu še-kar-ra-gal kár 𒋼𒀀
𒌗 𒊑 itu RI
𒌗 𒋗𒆰 itu šu-numun
𒌗 𒈫 𒀊 itu min ab (𒑊)
𒌗 𒂍 𒌗𒐋 itu e-itu-aš (more like 𒁖/𒂓)
𒌗 𒀭𒉈𒁯 itu ᵈNe-gün 𓎼 𓈖 𓄡 𓏏 𓇼
𒌗 𒂡 𒀭𒂅𒄀 itu Ezen ᵈDun-gi ⋍⋍
𒌗 𒉽𒌑𒂊 itu pa u e 𒂊⋍ gunu 𒆦𒀀
𒌗 𒀭𒌉𒍣 itu dDumu-zi
𒌗 𒋛𒀀 itu dirig (over)flow
